item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

It's been a while and the weather is nice and the patio is open....so this week's location is:

Geronimo Bar and Grill
271 Crown St (across the street from BAR)
New Haven, CT
Phone: 203-777-7700
http://www.geronimoba...

Come join the NHC at Geronimo. For those who haven't been, Geronimo is a Southwestern restaurant and bar, known for it's selection of 100 tequila and "authentic Sante Fe cuisine". The outdoor patio should be open!

Dink Specials include and will run until 9pm:

- $3 domestic beers
- $5 house wine
- $5 house cocktails
- $5 house margaritas

They will also set up a buffet table with some Happy Hour food.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

PLEASE RSVP so we can give the manager an accurate head count

Your contact for this event is Doug: 203-672-4888 (call if you need directions.. do not text me.. well you can text, but I won't receive them on this phone)

As some of you may know, Meetup does charge the Leadership twice a year for hosting the website. We do not pass this fee along in any mandatory way, however we will take donations at upcoming Happy Hours. Anything you can give towards defraying this cost to keeping the group going will be appreciated!  Please see AJ, Devorah, or Jason at an April Happy hour, Thanks!

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour at Geronimo Bar and Grill
